duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and coordinate daily operational activities for employees.
Manage projects, workload assignments, and timely completion of work.
Ensure quality and compliance with applicable regulations.
Maintain sufficient resources for group tasks and provide line-level management coordination for laboratory activities.
Oversee daily operations and assist in the preparation and implementation of company policies, quality systems, and training programs.
Set goals, assign and coordinate tasks, rank priorities, monitor and evaluate performance.
Apply scientific principles and concepts to complete deliverables and participate in conference calls with Sponsors on scientific matters.
Undertake other reasonably related duties as assigned from time to time.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in chemistry, biology, biochemistry, immunology, or molecular biology in a bioanalytical setting.
